In England, in the seven days to 22 March, there were 32,071 new confirmed cases (57.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 March, there were 32,776 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (705 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 March is 3,786,746 (6,727.6 cases per 100,000 population).
